name: VitaminOPedia
0:
”Alexa, open complete vitamin guide”
”Alexa, ask complete vitamin guide why we need vitamin A”
”Alexa, ask complete vitamin guide where to find vitamin E”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: complete vitamin guide
des: Though we all know that vitamin and minerals are essential nutrients for our body, very limited number of persons has good understanding of different vitamins, their functions in our body and their sources. Also many times vitamins are refereed by some alternative name which people don't understand. VitaminOPedia is a solution for these problems. This skill can give the user complete information of the vitamins. It can provide the alternative names of them, the major functions of them in our body and also the source food items for each one of them. One can ask the whole information at once or can ask for specific information. The data is taken from FDA approved source.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
